dmca.title: [ADMINS] Unauthorized Use of DreamWorks and Paramount Properties
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: David Caplan [dcaplan@kmwlaw.com]
Sent: Sunday, October 08, 2006 1:04 PM
To: Admins; abuse; put@putfile.com
Subject: [ADMINS] Unauthorized Use of DreamWorks and Paramount
Properties

October 8, 2006


VIA E-MAIL

The Planet.com and Internet Services, Inc.
1333 North Stemmons Freeway Suite 110
Dallas, TX 75207

admins@theplanet.com; abuse@theplanet.com; put@putfile.com 
 
            Re: Unauthorized Use of DreamWorks and Paramount Properties
 
http://media.putfile.com/Jennifer-Hudson---And-I-Am-Telling-You

To Whom It May Concern:

         This letter is being written to you on behalf of DreamWorks SKG
("DreamWorks") and Paramount Pictures Corporation ("Paramount").
DreamWorks and Paramount are the owners of copyright and other
intellectual property rights in and to the "And I Am Telling You" music
recording by Jennifer Hudson.  No one is authorized to copy, reproduce,
distribute, or otherwise use the "And I am telling You" music recording
without express written permission of Paramount and DreamWorks.

 We have recently learned that the web site located at
"http://media.putfile.com/Jennifer-Hudson---And-I-Am-Telling-You," for
which you are the service provider is reproducing and/or distributing
unauthorized copies of "And I Am Telling You." 

 On behalf of DreamWorks and Paramount, we request your assistance in
the removal of this link to the unauthorized content. 

        DreamWorks and Paramount the have good faith belief that the
disputed use identified above is not authorized by the copyright owner,
its agent, or the law.  We certify, under penalty of perjury, that the
above information is accurate and that we are authorized to act on
DreamWorks' and Paramount's behalf. 
        
Very truly yours,
/S/
David K. Caplan
Keats McFarland & Wilson LLP
dmca.principal_name: DreamWorks SKG ("DreamWorks") and Paramount Pictures Corporation ("Paramount")
